title: Charming Duplex with Historic Soul in Radziwie, Plock
description: This spacious duplex blends the timeless allure of its traditional architecture with 21st-century comforts. Five sunlit bedrooms and three elegant bathrooms are spread across an impressive 248 sqm layout, providing plenty of space for relaxation and working from home. Distinctive period details, a generous open living area, and a backyard barbecue zone offer an inviting atmosphere, while a state-of-the-art modern lighting system complements the historic character.
neighborhood_description: Set in Radziwie, one of Plock’s peaceful, rapidly modernizing districts, you'll enjoy green surroundings and proximity to parks and tranquil playgrounds. The neighborhood gracefully blends a legacy of artistic features and new community spaces sprouting in this modern development. Yet, it remains well-connected, with public transport and highway access making commutes simple, ideal for professionals venturing into local or regional business hubs.
lifestyle_benefits: easy commuting to city center and business parks
target_buyer: Perfect for relocating professionals or families who crave historical ambience combined with convenience. Those working in corporate positions in Plock or nearby regions will relish the superb transport access, stylish work & leisure quarters, and vibrant, verdant surroundings.
market_positioning: This rarely available duplex offers historic authenticity paired with exceptional upgrades, making it stand out among contemporary and traditional offerings in Radziwie. Strategically priced in the heart of the area’s upper-mid real estate segment, it appeals to upscale renters or buyers seeking a distinctive, timeless character alongside modern comfort.
